title: Data Analyst – Tableau - Remote
descriptionText:
Mô tả công việc:

(Mức lương: 22 - 28 triệu VNĐ)

Working Hours :

1/ Split shift : 3 PM - 6 PM (at office) and 9 PM - 2 AM (remote) (Mon – Fri)

2/ Full 5-hour shift : 9 PM - 6 AM (initial training by the company, can work remotely).

Job Descriptions :

- Design, create and maintain Tableau dashboards

- Conduct and create data analysis using Excel, SQL and Tableau

- Work closely with data engineers to design data models, maintain and validate data in data warehouse

- Conduct ad hoc industry research

- Create and update slides used in client meetings, business reviews, etc.

- Proactively communicate and collaborate with external and internal stakeholders to analyze information needs and functional requirements.

Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên

Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian, Bán thời gian

Quyền lợi được hưởng:

- We treat people fairly and with dignity, keeping a healthy perspective about life and work and fostering a positive and enjoyable work environment with appealing benefits as below:

- A competitive monthly salary based on your ability

- 13th month Tet bonus & bi-annual performance bonus

- Annual salary review

- Attractive employee awards: Employee of Year, Semi-Annual outstanding employee

- Social insurance and healthcare insurance upon Vietnam Labor Code

- PTI insurance package, and annual health check

- An English-speaking environment

- An open culture that spurs creativity, innovation, and inclusivity

- A variety of training courses for your career development

- Diverse activities to foster relationships, including company trips, year-end party, employees’ birthdays

- An open-space office, a cafeteria, and a range of modern equipment

- Other allowance from referrals and special occasions (weddings, seniority, and new-born baby)

Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học

Yêu cầu công việc:

- English fluently (IELTS from 7.5)

- Bachelor’s degree in MIS, Information Technology, Computer Science, or other quantitative major. An understanding of basic accounting/finance is a plus

- Significant data management and analysis experience

- Strong knowledge of Tableau and able to develop insightful dashboards and reports that drive business decision making and outcomes

- Intermediate to advanced Database and Transact SQL skills

- Intermediate PowerPoint

- Experience in Python, C#, VBA, and SSIS packages is a plus

- Understand data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques

Work Behavior :

- Ability to lead, plan and manage in an entrepreneurial, team-oriented environment

- Highly organized with strong project management skills, and drive to meet organizational objectives; ability to manage multiple projects on interrelated timelines.

- Strong written and verbal communication skills

- Results oriented self-starter, ready to challenge the status quo for continuous improvement and effectively solves problems and shares ideas for improvement with clear prioritization

Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam

Ngành nghề: Dữ Liệu - AI - Học Máy,Nghiên Cứu Thị Trường,Phân Tích Nghiệp Vụ (BA)

Đại Học

1 - 2 năm
